channel.title: Turning Point
channel.description: Dr. David Jeremiah's Turning Point Delivers the Unchanging Word of God to an Ever-Changing World
channel.itunes:author: David Jeremiah
channel.itunes:summary: Dr. David Jeremiah's Turning Point Delivers the Unchanging Word of God to an Ever-Changing World

item.title: God's Basic Plan for Security
item.description: The world tells us that accumulating wealth and possessions is the path to lasting joy. But God’s Word says that’s a lie, and gives us a better way. Dr. David Jeremiah highlights the night-and-day differences between investing in earthly treasures and making heavenly investments.
item.itunes:author: David Jeremiah
item.itunes:summary: The world tells us that accumulating wealth and possessions is the path to lasting joy. But God’s Word says that’s a lie, and gives us a better way. Dr. David Jeremiah highlights the night-and-day differences between investing in earthly treasures and making heavenly investments.
